attributes.action: remove vat from prices paid at swimming pools, gyms and all fitness venues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age where we are being bombarded about how we are becoming obese I think it is a shame to charge people VAT, for attending gyms, swimming pools and other fitness establishments.  Each week I take my family swimming and I pay for my children to have swimming lessons.  I feel I am lucky and can afford this but for some it is very hard to pay, so surely no VAT would help to get more people doing sport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
